info.name: Web Profile DPRD API
info.description: Auto-generated Postman collection covering authenticated and public routes for the Web Profile DPRD backend.

request.description: Authenticate user and receive bearer token.
Update current user password (password confirmation required).
Paginated list of users with roles.
Create new user and assign roles.
Update user data including optional password change.
Replace user roles with supplied IDs.
Create menu item (optional parent via menuId).
Create CMS page with HTML content.
Paginated list of video embed records.
Create video record with YouTube embed link.
Create news article with cover and attachments.
Public list of documents with optional search.
Update document metadata or replace file.
Paginated list of static content blocks.
Update static content (upload new file if needed).
List uploaded temporary files (searchable by filename).
Replace temporary file with a new upload.
Retry pushing failed survey submissions to external API.
Get survey submission detail by ID.
Get PPID by kategori (Informasi Berkala, Informasi Dikecualikan, Informasi Serta Merta, Informasi Setiap Saat).
Get kategori list from external API for Informasi Berkala.
Get kategori list from external API for Informasi Dikecualikan.

request.description: Get kategori list from external API for Informasi Setiap Saat.

Create new Informasi Berkala entry (with file upload).
Get Informasi Berkala detail by ID.
